overview: Eric works with mobile and internet companies at the growth stage of development. Prior to joining Sequoia Capital, Eric worked at Bain Capital Ventures, where he focused on opportunities in application and infrastructure software. Eric has a BA in Economics and Finance from Princeton University, along with an MBA from Harvard University. (Sequoia Capital)
